name: Vending Machine Ramen
description: Order ramen from a vending machine and enjoy a fresh, hot meal at popular spots like Ramen Nagi in Shinjuku.
highlights: Available at popular ramen chains like Ichiran, Afuri, and Ippudo

name: Loft Souvenir Shopping
description: A one-stop shop for unique Japanese souvenirs, including stationery, skincare, and home goods.

name: Shibuya Scramble Crossing
description: Experience the world's busiest intersection and its chaotic yet exciting atmosphere.
highlights: Best viewed from nearby Starbucks or Shibuya Sky
Less crowded early morning or late night
